examples.utterance: roy oswalt opened for the astros for eight years in a row, seven of which were in minute maid park, but in what year did he start the season opener in petco park?
what was the last season when mike scott was the opening day starter for the astros?
how many times was nolan ryan the opening day pitcher for the astros?
the astros have lost their season opener to the giants how many times since defeating them in the 1970 season opener?
which game had the greatest score difference?
who was the first astro to be the opening day pitcher in the astrodome?
this starting pitcher opened for the astros against the giants and the dodgers in the early 70s.

metadata.title: List of Houston Astros Opening Day starting pitchers
